#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ull long long int
#define  in(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define  out(a) printf("%lld",a)
#define  loop(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define  br printf("\n");
#define max(a,b)  ((a>b)?a:b)
#define min(a,b)  ((a<b)?a:b)



int main()
{
  ull t;
  in(t);
  while(t--)
  { 
    ull inp[100005]; 
    ull n,m,sumt=0;
    in(n);in(m);
    loop(i,n)
    {in(inp[i]); sumt+=inp[i];}
  
    sort(inp,inp+n);

    ull sum1=0,sum2=0;
    loop(i,min(n-m,m))
     sum1+=inp[i];
 
     out(sumt-sum1-sum1);
      br;
  
  }
  return 0;
}
